description: Out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists in V-Server v4.0.11.0 and earlier and V-Server Lite v4.0.13.0 and earlier, which may allow an attacker to obtain information and/or execute arbitrary code by having a user to open a specially crafted image file.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: V-Server v4.0.11.0 and earlier, and V-Server Lite v4.0.13.0 and earlier

vendor.name: FUJI ELECTRIC CO., LTD. / Hakko Electronics Co., Ltd.
